org.jpaste.pastebin

Class PastebinLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpaste.AbstractPasteLink
      • org.jpaste.pastebin.PastebinLink

  • public class PastebinLink
extends AbstractPasteLink
    A representation of an online pastebin paste.

    This class represents an existing pastebin paste URL

    Author:
    Brian B

        public void delete(java.lang.String developerKey,
          PastebinAccount account)
            throws PasteException
        Deletes this paste
        Parameters:
        account - the account which was used to create this paste
        developerKey - a developer key which can be fetched from the pastebin API page
        Throws:
        PasteException - if it failed to delete the paste
